Texts.Eng: Advertise the flagship product of the ^blue;Joja^reset; corporation in the comfort of your own home with this trendy sign!
Texts.Chs: 用这个时髦的标志，在舒适的家中为^blue;Joja^reset;公司的旗舰产品做广告！

Texts.Eng: Fitting that a tasteless beverage has an equally tasteless advertising.
Texts.Chs: 无味的饮料也有同样无味的广告。

Texts.Eng: I reckon I glow enough for my own place, thanks.
Texts.Chs: 我想我的容光焕发足够我住的地方了，谢谢。

Texts.Eng: Is this supposed to be wall art? It's such an eyesore.
Texts.Chs: 这应该是壁画吗？太碍眼了。

Texts.Eng: Isn't this cola a little new to be getting vintage decor signs?
Texts.Chs: 这瓶可乐是不是有点新，有古董装饰的标志？

Texts.Eng: The blue light from this sign is a little nauseating, actually.
Texts.Chs: 实际上，这个标志上的蓝光有点恶心。

Texts.Eng: Why would I want to display an advertisement in my home like this?
Texts.Chs: 为什么我想在家里展示这样的广告？
